entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:21 p.m. ADT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 3.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
